item.title: eclipset idea配置
item.description:
eclipse常用配置

编码集:window/proferences/general/workspace/other/utf-8

改字体:proferences/general/appearance/colors and fonts/basic/text font

启动时插件:proferences/general/startup and shutdown/可以全部去掉
